comment: * A class containing information about a pending system update.

variables.name: SECURITY_PATCH_STATE_UNKNOWN
variables.comment: * Represents it is unknown whether the system update is a security patch.

variables.name: SECURITY_PATCH_STATE_FALSE
variables.comment: * Represents the system update is not a security patch.

variables.name: SECURITY_PATCH_STATE_TRUE
variables.comment: * Represents the system update is a security patch.

variables.name: ATTR_ORIGINAL_BUILD
variables.comment: Tag used to store original build fingerprint to detect when the update is applied.

methods.name: public static SystemUpdateInfo of(long receivedTime, boolean isSecurityPatch)
public long getReceivedTime()
public int getSecurityPatchState()
methods.comment:
* Gets whether the update is a security patch.
     * @return {@link #SECURITY_PATCH_STATE_FALSE}, {@link #SECURITY_PATCH_STATE_TRUE}, or
     *         {@link #SECURITY_PATCH_STATE_UNKNOWN}.

methods.name: public void writeToXml(XmlSerializer out, String tag) throws IOException
public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public static SystemUpdateInfo of(long receivedTime, boolean isSecurityPatch)
public void writeToXml(XmlSerializer out, String tag) throws IOException
public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
